Open for on-site beer & food
No reservations required
12-10pm Sun-Thurs
12pm-12:30am Fri + Sat

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on August 17, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Miracles For Sale, a Pilsner.⠀
⠀
Taking this Tuesday evening slow and easy with our latest lager to hit the menu. Miracles For Sale is 5% abv and was lightly dry-hopped with Saaz. This pils is crackery and crisp, with subtle herbal notes. The perfect after work beer. We're pouring this one on-site and in growlers to go. 10oz pours in the zombie glass.⠀
⠀
#miraclesforsale #joecoleman #pilsner #crispyboi #crispyboy #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

buttons.text: Visit the COVID-19 Information Center for vaccine resources.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers in Foam Brewers. May be an image of drink and text that says '+ FoamBreuers COVID UPDATE'.

node.text:
Hello friends. In an effort to keep our community safe, and prevent other consequences that come with rising cases of COVID-19, we are now asking that all non-vaccinated guests wear masks when indoors. Our team is already following these rules and it is only fair to ask the same of our patrons.
 
We have really enjoyed seeing family, friends, live music, and more this summer. Please help prevent the spread of COVID-19 by getting vaccinated, wearing a mask, or both. We are more than happy to provide a mask for anyone that needs one.

*We turned off comments on this post as the purpose was to convey a temporary change in policy. If you have any questions or concerns, please reach out to us directly.*

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers in Foam Brewers with @pomykalafarm. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Beat the heat with Moon Pix, a new Gose-Style Sour Ale conditioned with over one hundred pounds of local cucumbers from @pomykalafarm and perfectly seasoned with a touch of pink Himalayan sea salt and lime. This is an effervescent thirst quencher. Crisp, garden-fresh, and delivering the exact flavors we want (dare we say need 😅) right now. 4.5% abv. Only available onsite for a limited time.⠀
⠀
#moonpix #catpower

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers in Foam Brewers with @thevacantlots. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
We have two more delicious beers releasing this week. Damage Control and Canvas are freshly filled, buttoned up and now ready for your enjoyment. Fresh as can be. ⠀
⠀
Damage Control is a Double India Pale Ale that we first released at the turn of the New Year, when things were feeling a pretty rocky and we were desperate for something else. We conceived this beer with The Vacant Lots @thevacantlots, the electro post-punk duo that inspired us for years and became friends along the way. Very much looking forward to the next time we see Jared and Brian take the stage. Art by 9.0% abv. $19/4pk.⠀
⠀
Canvas has been in existence for a bit longer. Charting its path as the only Pale Ale featured in our regular rotation of cans, Canvas represents an opportunity for comfort and consistency while at the same time providing room for experimentation and growth. 4.5%. $14/pk. Art by you. ⠀
⠀
p.s. Last seasons winner of #FoamCanvasContest will be announced in the coming weeks. New season starts now. Check .foambrewers.com/canvas-contest to learn more.⠀
⠀
#foambrewers #purebeer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers in Foam Brewers with @blackhaireddemon, and @mary_lacy. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Today was a hot one 😰 . Cool off with one of these three beers, fresh off the line. Now available on Lake Street and at The Annex. Order for pickup online or just swing on by. ⠀
⠀
Distopian Dream Girl⠀
7.0% IPA. $16/4pk⠀
Art by Heidi Geist⠀
⠀
The Shining⠀
8.0% DIPA. $18/4pk⠀
Art by @blackhaireddemon⠀
⠀
Pavement⠀
8.2% DIPA. $18/4pk⠀
Art by @mary_lacy⠀
⠀
#purebeer

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Foam Brewers on August 10, 2021 tagging @freestylehops. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Freshly tapped and available on draft only, we introduce Dead Flowers, a Pale Ale brewed with our friends at @freestylehops during their recent visit to Vermont.⠀
⠀
This beer is a true beauty in every respect of the word, presenting notes of fresh melon, tropical fruit juice, a hint of lime, and an overall experience that reminds of us of a creamsicle. Dead Flowers features Freestyle Hops' select Riwaka and Southern Cross alongside a grain bill and fermentation profile designed to produce an utterly soft pale ale that allow the aromatics and flavor characteristics produced by these unique hops to shine. 6.2% alcohol by volume. Only available for draft and growler fills for a limited time at our original location in Burlington. ⠀
⠀
Huge thank you to the Freestyle team for working with us on this one. We had a blast with you and we are already looking forward to next years visit. From sipping KOHA during the morning mash in, to watching you guys absolutely thrash the drum kit, keys, and guitar on the Foam stage at night, that was one for the books.⠀
⠀
#deadflowers #rollingstones #freestylehops #thelostprofits #riwaka #southerncross #hops

Photo by Foam Brewers on August 07, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
The Question Is To See It All...
⠀
On this hot summer day, we're coolin off with one of our newest, and boldest draft beers at 112 Lake St. The Question Is To See It All is a 9.5% Triple IPA brewed with oats, fermented with passion fruit, and conditioned on pineapple and blood orange. This TIPA was also dry-hopped with a little bit of Whitefield Hops' Columbus. The fruits utilized in this beer combine to create something special. As expected, this beer drinks like a tropical fruit smoothie. Notes of Orange Julius and Guava coat the palate. We're looking around wondering where the palms trees are with this one in our hands... Hope you enjoy. Pouring on-site and in growlers to-go. Happy Saturday everyone.

[Music Tonight]
@osageorangemusic hits the stage tonight at 9!! Be there!
⠀
#thequestionistoseeitall #darkside #nicolasjaar #tripleipa #tipa #tropicalfruit #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo shared by Foam Brewers on August 05, 2021 tagging @stevesharonart. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
We got a wild one for ya. Available now: Odd Pets 082021A, a Fruited Gose-Style Sour Ale, and Things I Imagined, a Fruited IPA.⠀
⠀
August has arrived and we're kicking it off with a beer that fits the season. For our latest version of Odd Pets, we were able to source a couple rather uncommon tropical fruits. This Gose-Style Sour was conditioned on Lulo and Curuba, as well as Sea Salt. Each of these fruits brings forth bright citrus characteristics that we thought would be complimented quite well in a Gose-style beer, along with Sea Salt. On the nose, passion fruit and pineapple jump right out at you. To follow, a strong citrus kick accompanied by a beautiful full body and a welcome salinity. On the finish, a quenching tartness that lingers just for a second before evaporating, leaving you poised for that next sip. We can't wait to share this one with you. 5% abv.⠀
⠀
The art on this series is by our friend @stevesharonart.⠀
⠀
In addition, we have one of our favorite Fruited IPAs, Things I Imagined. This beer is 6.5% and is brewed with lactose and conditioned with pineapple and vanilla bean. It's dry-hopped with Citra and Motueka, and puts forth notes of candied fruit with a creamy body. The photography on this can is by none other than @MontgomerySheridan.⠀
⠀
Both beers, as well as the three from yesterday's post are available now both in Burlington and Hinesburg.⠀
⠀
#sourale #oddpets #ipa #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text:
Available now in Burlington: Built To Spill, Wipeout Beat, and Dead Wax.⠀
⠀
Built To Spill, 8% Double IPA ⠀⠀
Dry-hopped with Citra and Galaxy⠀⠀
Notes of citrus, pineapple, and tangerine⠀⠀
Art by @jackson.tupper⠀⠀⠀
⠀
Wipeout Beat, 10% Triple IPA⠀
Dry-hopped Riwaka, Sultana and Bru - 1⠀
Notes of Pineapple juice, white grape, creamy⠀
In memory of @officialalanvega. Art by @michaelhandis⠀
⠀
Dead Wax, 7.2% IPA⠀
Dry-hopped with Denali, Vic Secret and Azacca.⠀
Notes of tangerine, pineapple and creamsicle. Art by @smallsuture created January of 2019⠀
⠀
All three can be ordered to-go at 112 Lake St. as well as online via beer.foambrewers.com. More to come tomorrow.⠀
⠀
#dipa #doubleipa #tripleipa #indiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on August 03, 2021. May be an image of drink.

node.text:
Two freshies to hit the draft lines at 112 this week. Thanks to you all we've been kicking beers and constantly brewing that new new to replace em.⠀
⠀
Remembering Mountains is a 9.8% Triple IPA dry-hopped with Champlain.Valley.Hops Nugget, Whitefield Hops Cascade, and Zappa. This beer is a tropical fruit smoothie bomb allllll day. Notes of vanilla cream accompany a nutty mouthfeel. Not a bad option for a beaut like tonight. ⠀
⠀
Sand That Moves is certainly the lower ABV addition to the draft list, but not lacking in flavor. A 5.5% lactose Pale Ale, Sand That Moves was dry-hopped with NZ32 and @Champlain.valley.hops Cascade & Centennial. You'll find a fruit forward palate reminiscent of papaya and dragonfruit, with a creamy mouthfeel. This one's a go to if you're looking for an easy-sipper with plenty of flavor.⠀
⠀
Both beers are pouring on-site and in growlers to go!⠀
⠀
[Music + Food Tonight]⠀
@local_dork is spinning vinyl and setting the vibe tonight from 6-9pm and our guy Dave is slinging the vegan fire from his truck @dosfeosvt. Looks like he just pulled up!!
⠀
#rememberingmountains #karendalton #sharonvanetten #sandthatmoves #animalcollective #tripleipa #tipa #ipa #hoppybeer #paleale #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart

node.text: A Monday evening in Burlington. We'll take it.

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Foam Brewers on July 30, 2021. May be an image of drink and indoor.

node.text:
Introducing Sometimes Always, an Oat Double IPA.⠀
⠀
As the rain clears up for the weekend, we'll be enjoying our latest addition to the draft list. Sometimes Always was hopped with @champlain.valley.hops' Cascade in the whirlpool, and subsequently dry-hopped with El Dorado and Comet once in the fermenter. We utilized oats in this DIPA to contribute to that creamy mouthfeel reminding us of a creamsicle. This beer is wildly expressive of citrus and tropical notes, opening with a burst of candied orange peel leading into fresh squeezed pineapple juice. Sometimes Always is 8.8% abv and pouring on-site and in growlers to-go.⠀
⠀
[MUSIC TONIGHT]⠀
@reidparsonsmusic hits the stage at 9pm! Come through!⠀
#sometimesalways #doubleindiapaleale #hoppybeer #hazybeer #neipa #vtipa #foambrewers #purebeer #timekillsart
